about.part-one: I am a Full Stack Developer with 7 years of experience delivering scalable, reliable, and high-impact solutions. I bring strong expertise in JavaScript/TypeScript, Node.js, React, React Native, AWS, and PostgreSQL, along with solid experience in distributed systems, event-driven architectures, and cloud services. Throughout my career, I've worked end-to-end across the development lifecycle, applying best engineering practices and a systems-focused mindset.
about.part-two: I have hands-on experience with modern messaging and cloud technologies such as Kafka, AWS SQS, and Pub/Sub (GCP). My work includes building real-time notification systems and implementing performance optimizations that significantly improved application efficiency and reduced critical operation times. I also contribute technical documentation and engineering standards that strengthen the teams and products I work with.
about.part-three: I am committed to continuous learning and collaborative problem-solving. My core strengths include clear communication, ownership, structured problem-solving, results-driven execution, and proactive collaboration across cross-functional teams. I focus on raising product quality, driving technical excellence, and fostering a transparent and efficient work environment.

Thoughtworks.resume: Working with asynchronous messaging technologies such as Pub/Sub on Google Cloud Platform (GCP), I developed real-time irregularity notification tools. I also produced technical documentation that I shared both within and beyond my team, generating a positive impact across the organization.
results: Significant reduction in irregularity resolution time.
Identification and mapping of new irregularities that previously had no visibility.
Team-wide and cross-team impact by driving the adoption of database version control tools.

Maxxi.resume: I improved the offline-first approach for a mobile application with conflicts resolver both in the mobile and backend side, then it minimized the user's first synchronization waiting time by 90%. Additionally, I worked with technologies like Kafka and AWS SQS in previous projects.
results: Mobile app user's first synchronization waiting time minimized by 90%.
Development and publication of apps in the App Store and Play Store.
Implementation of monitoring systems in web and mobile applications.
Integrations between SAP systems and APIs in NestJS through messenger tools like Kafka and AWS SQS.
Web development of Blockchain and NFT integration system.

Lanlink.resume: Development and maintenance of the company's internal system. Application of new technologies such as real-time messaging. Creation and validation of new system functionalities. Working on projects with clients. From July 2019 to May 2020, I was an intern.

IMMIFS.resume: Development of new functionalities for the system developed by the company from a template. Application CI/CD with GitLab.
